adjective.description: Designating or relating to the period in the development of human culture during which simple stone tools begin to be used; designating or relating to the earliest part of the Stone Age.
Designating primitive stone implements with minimal shaping; designating or relating to the use of such implements.
Geology. Of the nature of or relating to a protolith.

origin: Mid 19th century. From proto- + -lithic, after Neolithic, Palaeolithic, etc.
